ygData.subject: Re: All these new intros
ygData.msgSnippet: I the most magnificent Zardoz, the Great High Elven Mage, wish to concur with that unfortunate dimwit call Itan, (cough cough) the erudite, and bid all a most
ygData.messageBody:
I the most magnificent Zardoz, the Great High Elven Mage, wish to concur
with that unfortunate dimwit call Itan, (cough cough) the erudite, and
bid all a most hearty welcome. Should our paths ever cross, except for
necros, I pledge you my assistance in whatever endeavor you are
attempting.


----Original Message Follows----
From: silten@...
Reply-To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
Subject: [Bristlebane_EQ] All these new intros
Date: 5 Apr 1999 19:29:31 -0000

From: silten@...

I, Itan the Whistler, simply do not have enough time to welcome you all
individually, but please accept this note as a welcome never the less.

Unless you are a necro, in which case, enjoy it while it lasts you foul
wretch. You will not be long in this world, and the next holds few
pleasures for you.

Itan
